message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $115 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do better than that. How about $122.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.
